tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
***Worst experience***. It took us 2 months to recover from the incident we had in this hospital. 

We have visited prasad infertility hospital for pregnancy test. We had followed all the doctor instructions and visited regularly for check up. Used all medicines and injections. Later after 45 days we found blood spots which is common during pregnancy. When we visited hospital for the regular health check up we informed the same to doctor. Then doctor advised on prescription for one progesterone but nurse have given 2 progesterone. Then suddenly my wife started bleeding like anything and she was about to fall on the floor then they asked us to go for second opinion. My wife was continuously bleeding but still we have went for second opinion and their they given report as partial abortion. 

1) when the doctor has written 1 injection why nurse has given two injections? Still my wife feeling that injection pain and she gained weight of 10 kgs and become more weak. In the span of 45 days they injected 4 progesterone. ***** * **** *** **** *** ***** ** *** ****** **** ** **** ***** 

2) For the second opinion they asked us to visit a nearest lab. When we told that can this be done tomorrow ! then they said my wife will be going to bleed over the night and she may die. How come these people know that my wife going to bleed more? When we visit to report the spot bleeding? ***** **** **** ************* ***** *** ********** *** *** ********* **** **** **** ** *** ******** *** ***** * **** **** * ******* ******** ***** **** ******* ***** * ***** ********* ** **** **** ****** * And it costed us for the abortion 35000.

Everytime me and my wife only visited and we blindly believed doctors and nurses. This teach us good lesson in the life, which we never forget. 

Want to share the incident because my baby never going to come back again. But trying to share this so that no others can face.
Dr. Suma garu is so friendly,humble and approachable doctr. I can't put into words my gratitude for evrything u have done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Choosing to undergo a laparoscopic hysterectomy was a significant decision for me, but Dr. K. Suma Prasad's
Hand holding me all through the surgery and during hospital stay made me happy. From the initial consultation to post-operative care, Dr. Prasad and her team ensured my comfort and well-being every step of the way. Grateful for their exceptional care and support throughout this journey. Dr. Suma is my family doctor Now. # ****************** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Living with PCOD was overwhelming until I found hope at Prasad Hospitals under the care of Dr. K. Suma Prasad. Her expertise and compassion guided me through my journey to better health. Grateful for the personalized care and support from the entire team at Prasad HospitalsManikonda ****************************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly and made very comfortable. But there is one issue with hospital , we had an reappointment on friday and upon reaching there we found doctor is not available, we tried multiple branches of prasad hospital but they are not aware completely when doctor would be coming. 1st time appointment was smooth but getting a second visit is very very difficult. It’s been 3 days and still we are told doctor would be visiting tomorrow.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have an irregular menses problem since 1 year. Consulted many Gynecologists for this issue but my PCOD never resolved. One of my relative suggested to consult Dr. Suma for PCOD treatment. I have visited Prasad Hospital for Dr. Suma consultation. She has suggested few investigations and based on my hormone levels she kept me on medication for 3 months and strictly advised me not to stop the treatment in between. Within a span of 3 months, my irregular menses got resolved and now my periods are regular. All thanks to Dr. Suma.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Visited Prasad infertility solutions and consulted Dr. K. Suma for my pregnancy care. I have an history of miscarriage during my early pregnancy. My friend has suggested to consult Dr. Suma for my pregnancy care. She has explained the situation and kept me on injections that supports pregnancy and advised cerclage procedure and also suggested to be on complete bed rest for few weeks. I underwent through the procedure. Now I have completed my TIFFA scan and till now everything is going well. I recommend Prasad Infertility Solutions for high-risk pregnancy care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited this place yesterday, Booked my appointment from Practo. Still I had to wait for almost 2 hours, as doctor had some emergency surgeries to attend. 

The frontdesk staff are really good, they answer with care and courtesy. But all the same, could have managed the time a little better.

Once in the doctor's presence, all the bitterness in long waiting is gone. She talked to us like a family member. She patienly listened, understood our issue. I'd recommend anyone with need to visit this place. I can surely say, we left with a feeling that we found teh best doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I visited multiple doctors earlier and was asked for scan almost everyweek followed by unnessesary medication. 
Some how I came to know about Dr.Suma prasad. The first appointment itself made me confident I shall be fine nd the same happened after few vists. Followed by which  I was advised IVF treatment. Staff at the clinice also was friendly and believsupportive in transparency. There was a emergency situation late night and staff and doctors were approachable and answered my phone call with hesitation.
Dr. Sirisha at the clinice is so friendly and belive in treating the root cause of problem always approchable and always has a personal touch.
I HIGHLY RECOMMEND PRASAD CLINICE FOR ANY GYNIC ISSUSS AS THIS CLINIC BE LIVES IN HUMANITY AND WORKS HARD ALONG WITH THE PATIENT TILL THEY GET CURED. BEST DOCTORS LIKE DR.SUMA PRASAD AND DR SIRISHA WHO MAKES THE PATIENT BELIVE THEY WILL BE FINE.
THANK YOU ALL!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: **** ***** *** ****** ******* *** **********where no words to explain about her... never I saw a doctor with such a patience towards communicating or explanation about the issues and her treatment was really excellent ..if I get a chance I will suggest others pregancy ladies to take treatment with Suma madam such an awesome doctor she is ....I completely satisfied with hospital and also treatment which was given to me.once again thankful to Suma madam for which she did treatment to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm glad writing this review because suma mam is such an awesome doctor so far i have seen....The hospital staff are also very supportive and they help us in all ways we need. Recommended 100% and more than worthy as they are...i'm taking treatment here more than a year and till now i didn't felt any difficulty. I'm also little bit worried after reading the negative reviews...but those are absolutely false... after i went to the hospital the staff guides me in all helpful ways and they are very supportive too. Definitely the best hospitality and very best environment. Please go without any doubts....please don't fall for unusual negatives...100% worthy to suggest others.

tags: Wait time,

When we reached hospital and enquired with receptionist couple of times whether suma madam is there or not? She said yeah madam is there...
When we paid and went to suggested room, the nurse is saying that srujana madam is there suma madam is not there again we reached at reception and she is saying madam is there . Basically these people are playing with patient s with the name of suma madam. Not sure about doctor but hospital staff is carel

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Prasad’s Fertility centre as a last try(after many multiple other hospitals) with a lot of hope to get conceived. Dr.Suma has been very kind to first understand the problem and giving us the confidence that we surely can be parents (Btw i was also delivered by Dr.Suma❤️) .  It’s been 1yr i have been seeing them and i am 8th month pregnant now..We cant express how happy we are.. !! Throughout the journey from Day1 of my Visit i had set of procedures to undergo.. But Dr.Suma , Dr.Shravanya, Dr.Shravya and their most friendly staff Jaroosha, Bhagya and Usha have been so cooperative and made us feel so comfortable that i never felt the pain of visiting the hospital multiple times.. !! 
Infertility treatments definitely involves a lot of Mental, Physical, Financial and Emotional Investment… what helped me to overcome all of them is ofcourse the comfort at which i was being treated and councelled.

For you may be its a part of your Job to treat your patients but I must say **You guys are giving lives to our Hopes and Bringing in Difference in our lives** 

We cant Thank you enough but will surely have gratitude towards you for rest of our Lives!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Suma is a highly dedicated professional and experienced. She understood my mom's problem thoroughly and explained the problem to me and my dad. She is also keen about my mother's medical history. Staff is also very courteous and decent. Very polite guys. I highly recommend this great doctor for all Gynecology, Andrology and other problems. Cheers guys,-Vamshi

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My self mamatha Dr.suma prasad mam done ivf on October 2nd  2020 the first attempt was successful i got positive with twins. We really thankful to suma Mam. 
Suma Mam was very friendly and polite. I recommend strongly prasadinfertilitysolution.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have visited the first time Dr. Suma Ma'am is very friendly and explained everything very clearly with a great approach, She tested and gave a plan for the treatment and we had amazing results, and also her staff was very helpful to us, We are so very happy and so grateful to Dr. Suma madam and staff.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: There is no queue ** **** *** *** ***** ****** There is no order ,there is no system in place. The staff does things as they please with taking no consideration of the time of the patients. Have been the last one to be taken in for a consult despite being there at a decent time. People coming so much longer after me were sent in and I was made to wait. Would not recommend. Find a clinic that has a system and not this one. Lot to work on

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,
review: Dr.Suma Prasad Madam, You take us right through from consultation to conception... Thank you so much for helping us to make our dreams come true. Blessed with a baby girl in this month. This is the best gift anyone could ever give us and we owe it all to you! Thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Writing this review after 9 months.Delivered a healthy baby girl. I still remember the first moment I've met Suma Mam. Always welcomes with a smile, generous and down to earth person. Prescribes medicenes which are necessary only. Her attention to detail and treatment are exemplary. Don't fall in the prey of negative reviews/comments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Based on Practo ratings I decided to meet Dr. Suma. On my visit Dr. Suma was extremely loving, did a full scan to understand the reason for me not being able to concieve, as I was trying to concieve for four years. After check up, she explained the course of treatment and what should I look forward to.The best part was Ma'am was always patient in explaining the treatment and cleared my doubts always.She also has an excellent support staff and they too are very cooperative and supportive.My experience with Dr. Suma has been the best and I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Meeting Dr. Suma was a great experience. we had one consultation during planning our pregnancy. We realized that we were on diabetic border (as told in the test recommended by the doctor). so we did all we had to do to get pregnant. And successfully it happened. Every month we had consultations and my wife was taken great care. she got cvid in her last month  that also was taken care off. in July 2021 we had a beautiful baby girl. Thank you Dr. Suma and team for their continuous support and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Before visiting prasad hospital, we have been to many hospitals but we didnt get solution for our infertility problem. After visiting to prasad hospital, tests for me and my husband were done. Due to some fertility and financial problems me and my husband were very much depressed. But Suma Madam has counselled and gave us confidence that we can go through this problem. Madam has even given us some concession in the treatment fee where most of the hospitals refuse. She has explained the whole process clearly and guided us towards the fertility treatment. After undergoing the treatment for two months I have successfully conceived and this is all thanks to Dr Suma Prasad Madam Now I'm three months pregnant after long waiting of 9 years. Even staff are very supportive and friendly. Thanks to Prasad infertility solutions, Dr Suma Madam, Dr Shravanya Madam, Sister Usha, Sister Bhagya and Sister Jerusha. Sincerely our family is very grateful to Dr Suma Prasad Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr.Suma is absolutely fantastic and friendly. I'm a long term PCOS patient and visited her as my periods have been missed for two consecutive months. She has done PS and confirmed the pregnancy. She was kind and good at explaining stuff. But the clinic is relatively small and the staff are mediocre. I'm indebted to Doctor for letting me know of the good news in a really sweet way. But I don't think I'd visit the clinic again as my family usually deals with pregnancy at Birth Place. Thankyou doc for being the angel you are <3.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Well, it was quiet difficult to find the location for me since I was new to this place. I had called the hospital and asked them to direct the way to hospital she came out of the hospital and guided me . Hospitality of the employees and even hospital is so good . Usually it happens that for consulting Doc should wait for hours But here with in no min I got a call for OP. I should say this I would bow my head towards Dr. Suma Such a lovely person she has very patience to listen and then she explained the way I loved it. 

Kudos to the entire team.
She is amazing :) she made me really comfortable, she is very friendly and I got recovered within a week.
On time appointment was not done it took lot of time to consult the doctor....that's a part the doctor was very friendly and very kind response 🥰
